scenes.action_text: DATE NIGHT Written by Josh Klausner June 11, 2008 FADE IN: INT. BACHELOR APARTMENT BEDROOM - NIGHT A modest city bedroom. Suitcases and half-unpacked boxes sit on one side of the room. Sc_-orLe's -moving in. In his bathrobe, PHIL FOSTER, a good looking guy in his mid-20's, hums to himself as he looks through stacks of WEDDING PICTURES organized all over the bed. Just as he finishes up a pile and starts another, beautifu

Clara peeks out through the double door windows. Frank and Harry continue through the crowd, unaware. VOICE (O.S.) Watch it! Clara quickly hugs a large bulletin board covered with pictures and time schedules as a WAITER carries a large tray of food past her. 68. As she moves off the wall, some papers drop.
